title: Raiders!: The Story of the Greatest Fan Film Ever Made
description: Three childhood friends attempt to finish the pet project they've worked on for over 30 years: re-creating "Raiders of the Lost Ark" shot for shot.

title: Ram Dass, Going Home
description: From his home on Maui, pioneering researcher, author and spiritual teacher Ram Dass reflects on love, life and death as his own days draw to a close.

title: Rapture
description: Groundbreaking artists share their life stories in this vibrant documentary series that captures hip-hop's impact on global culture.

title: Rats
description: Explore the icky world of rats and witness how their talent for surviving in almost any environment has led to catastrophic events throughout history.

title: Real Crime: A Very Special Constable
description: When a special constable is stabbed to death outside her house, a botched robbery is suspected until police uncover shocking clues closer to home.

title: Real Crime: Diamond Geezers
description: In an attempted heist worthy of a Hollywood film, a cadre of criminals sets out to steal the world's largest perfect diamond from a London landmark.

title: Real Crime: Hannah's Killer
description: Determined to bring the man responsible for their daughter's murder to justice, a Southampton couple embarks on a grueling five-year crusade.

title: Real Crime: Supermarket Heist (Tesco Bomber)
description: In 2000, U.K. detectives spent months tracking a criminal known only as Sally, who was targeting a supermarket chain with extortion and letter bombs.

title: Recovery Boys
description: In a region ravaged by opioid abuse, four young men in a farming-based rehab forge a bond as they try to reinvent their lives after years of addiction.

title: Refugee
description: Five acclaimed photographers travel the world to provide detailed insight into the difficult conditions faced by refugees who dream of a better life.
actors: Cate Blanchett, Lynsey Addario, Omar Victor Diop, Graciela Iturbide

title: Reincarnated
description: Vice magazine's Andy Capper follows rapper Snoop Dogg on a pilgrimage to Jamaica, where he rechristens himself Snoop Lion, a reggae artist.
actors: Snoop Dogg, Dr. Dre, Bunny Wailer

title: ReMastered: Tricky Dick & The Man in Black
description: This documentary chronicles Johnny Cash's 1970 visit to the White House, where Cash's emerging ideals clashed with Richard Nixon's policies.

title: ReMastered: Who Shot the Sheriff
description: In 1976, reggae icon Bob Marley survived an assassination attempt as rival political groups battled in Jamaica. But who exactly was responsible?

title: Residente
description: The results of a DNA test spur Puerto Rican rap icon Residente to set out on a global voyage in search of his roots and fresh musical inspiration.

title: Restless Creature: Wendy Whelan
description: After 30 years with the New York City Ballet, celebrated dancer Wendy Whelan redefines herself as an artist in a new stage of life.
actors: Peter Martins, Sean Suozzi, Gretchen Smith, Ashley Laracey

title: Revenge Porn
description: This eye-opening investigation of so-called "revenge porn" shows how easily a sexually charged share can go public if it gets into the wrong hands.

title: Reversing Roe
description: Through interviews with abortion rights supporters and opponents, this film lifts the lid on a decades-long political campaign to overturn Roe v. Wade.

title: Rolling Papers
description: As the newspaper industry takes a hit, The Denver Post breaks new ground with a section dedicated to cannabis culture.

title: Roman Empire
description: This stylish mix of documentary and lavish historical epic chronicles the turbulent, violent reigns of Commodus and Julius Caesar.
actors: Sean Bean, Aaron Jakubenko, Edwin Wright, Mike Edward

title: Romeo Is Bleeding
description: This documentary follows poet Donté Clark as he tries to address the violence in his hometown of Richmond, California, by staging "Romeo and Juliet."

title: Ronnie Coleman: The King
description: Today, legendary bodybuilder Ronnie Coleman's body bears the scars of becoming the best in the world. Here, he shares what it took to reach his goals.

title: Rush: Beyond the Lighted Stage
description: Celebrate the remarkable 40-year career of influential Canadian rockers Rush with this documentary, which details the band's formation and evolution.
